001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain;
002
003import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
004import com.google.gson.annotations.Expose;
005import com.google.gson.annotations.SerializedName;
006import java.time.Instant;
007import java.util.Date;
008
009/**
010 * The User class encapsulates the essential attributes of a user/player in the UNO application.
011 * This class provides methods to retrieve user details.
012 */
013public class User {
014
015  @Expose
016  @SerializedName(value = "key", alternate = "id")
017  private String id;
018
019  @Expose
020  private String displayName;
021
022  @Expose
023  private Date created;
024
025  /**
026   *  Constructs a User.
027   */
028  public User() {
029    id = null;
030    displayName = "";
031    created = new Date();
032  }
033
034  public String getId() {
035    return id;
036  }
037
038  @NonNull
039  public String getDisplayName() {
040    return displayName;
041  }
042
043  @NonNull
044  public Date getCreated() {
045    return created;
046  }
047
048}
